Text:
Thanks for this, Brego.  I've been looking for it for years.
Haven't watched it yet, still d/l'ing, but it's an American classic.  Perhaps the narration has been dubbed in French on this version.  Who cares... my favorite, Luscious Linda McDowell, appears in this collection of John Holmes oldies.
Have viewed bits.  Not in French.  Wouldn't matter anyhow.  This is a narrated collage of John Holmes clips.  Some genuine beauties here.  John in his prime.
